summary: A contract killer with a tragic past trains a teenage girl to avenge the murder of her family and falls for her in the process.
cast: Bobby Deol|Rani Mukerji|Ashish Vidyarthi|Farida Jalal|Mohan Joshi|Mahavir Shah|Sachin Khedekar|Malaika Arora|Ganesh Acharya|Ishrat Ali|Dolly Bindra|Suresh Chatwal|Avtar Gill|Gulshan|Hans Raj Hans|Mandeep|Pramod Moutho|Jaspal Sandhu|Virendra Saxena|Santosh Shetty|Siddharth|Yogi
keywords: apartment building|sunglasses|remake of french film|corrupt cop|villain
title: Bichhoo
